XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle blocks/glsubs on Glossary Enhancements

TABLE.NAME: block_glsubs_glossaries_subs
TABLE.COMMENT: Table to keep track of full user glossary subscriptions per User ID

FIELD.COMMENT: User ID for identifying users with full glossary subscriptions

FIELD.NAME: glossaryid
FIELD.COMMENT: Glossary IDs for full subscriptions for a UserID

FIELD.COMMENT: flag to show if the full user glossary subscription is active

FIELD.NAME: newcategories
FIELD.COMMENT: New Categories Subscription Flag

FIELD.COMMENT: New Concepts without categories Subscription flag

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID for the Glossary Category subscription

FIELD.NAME: glossaryid
FIELD.COMMENT: Glossary ID for the User subscription

FIELD.NAME: categoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: Glossary Category ID for the User ID subscription

FIELD.NAME: active
FIELD.COMMENT: Active flag for the User Glossary Category subscription

FIELD.COMMENT: User ID for the concept and or comments subscription

FIELD.NAME: glossaryid
FIELD.COMMENT: Glossary ID for the Concept a User is Subscribing to

FIELD.NAME: conceptid
FIELD.COMMENT: Concept ID of the Glossary Entries (id) which a User is subscribing to

FIELD.NAME: commentsactive
